mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, fix, replyCnt, groupNo, groupOrd, depth from board where bno > 0 order by groupNo desc, groupOrd asc limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, updatedate = now() where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from board where bno > 0
mapper.update: update board set replyCnt = replyCnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert:
insert board ( groupNo, groupOrd, depth, title, content, writer )
values ( #{groupNo}, #{groupOrd} + 1, #{depth} + 1, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
